description:
Non material amendment to planning permission P2017/3349/S73 dated 01/03/2018. 
The proposed amendments are to amend condition 23 (BREEAM) as follows:
(a) to assess the scheme under BREEAM 2014 rather than 2011;
(b) to allow the condition to be dealt with in stages; student element and retail elements (shell and core and fully fitted).
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 23 of permission P2017/3349/S73  is acceptable:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall achieve the relevant BREEAM certification. Evidence of compliance shall be provided as follows:

a)	Prior to occupation, a design stage recognised accreditation certificate and supporting assessment confirming that the student accommodation achieves a BREEAM New Construction rating, 2014, of no less than 'Excellent' shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 
b)	Prior to occupation, a design stage recognised accreditation certificate and supporting assessment confirming that the retail unit (shell and core) achieves a BREEAM New Construction rating, 2014, of no less than 'Excellent' shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 
c)	Within four months of occupation, evidence confirming that the retail unit (fully fitted) achieves a BREEAM Refurbishment and Fit-out, 2014, of no less than 'Excellent' shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 
 
The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall achieve the agreed rating(s) and shall be maintained as such thereafter.  
 
REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and to secure sustainable development.
